p: We are seeking a Python Developer (Entry Level) to become an integral part of our team! You will be responsible for creating and modifying computer application software or specialized utility programs.

li: Analyze user needs and develop software solutions
li.1: Work with project manager or product owner to meet specification needs
li.2: Recommend software upgrades to optimize operational efficiency
li.3: Collaborate with other developers to design and optimize code
li.4: Create flowcharts and user guides for new and existing programs
li.5: Document all programming tasks and procedures

li: Previous experience in software development, computer engineering, or other related fields
li.1: Knowledge of Java, Python, or other programming languages
li.2: Familiarity with relational databases such as MySQL, Oracle, and SQL Server
li.4: Strong analytical and critical thinking skills
